TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/Window/MaxCaption extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides objects for each state of the title bar of a maximized window. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Each property of the VisualStyleElement.Window.MaxCaption class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for a different state of the title bar of a maximized window.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.MaxCaption.Active%2A> property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementWindowMaxCaption1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#345](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.windows.forms.v_45_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#345](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.windows.forms.v_45_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents the title bar of a maximized active window.
Docs.value: A that represents the title bar of a maximized active window.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Active property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Active property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementWindowMaxCaption1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#345](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.windows.forms.v_114_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#345](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.windows.forms.v_114_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents the title bar of a maximized disabled window.
Docs.value: A that represents the title bar of a maximized disabled window.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Disabled property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Disabled property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementWindowMaxCaption3` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#347](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/7ab8cede-f9fb-407a-8553-_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#347](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/7ab8cede-f9fb-407a-8553-_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents the title bar of a maximized inactive window.
Docs.value: A that represents the title bar of a maximized inactive window.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Inactive property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Inactive property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementWindowMaxCaption2` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
